TopicTitle: Video Wednesday: A Small Jump for a Kerbale

Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" src="https://40.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_nm1kjrV7hY1rr2wit_540.jpg"/></figure><p>T0mR0b1n created a vector animation in which he takes us through a flight in Kerbal Space Program in his own style. The resulting video has great quality and has a unique artstyle to it. A well deserved feature!<br/></p><figure data-url="https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DHIhsai6sCiY%26feature%3Dyoutu.be" data-orig-height="304" data-orig-width="540" data-provider="youtube" class="tmblr-embed tmblr-full"><iframe id="youtube_iframe" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HIhsai6sCiY?feature=oembed&enablejsapi=1&origin=https://safe.txmblr.com&wmode=opaque" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="304" width="540"></iframe></figure>

Glad that this video made it here! I watched it a while back and was overly impressed with the quality of the video. I want to extend my good wishes to T0mR0b1n again, to continue to create these fantastic videos!!

During the whole time I was watching this view, I thought to myself... "made in Gimp right?"

Also, I find the new "Add Music" button for YouTube to be very useful.
I'm still surprised it wasn't a Rick Roll.

I'm still surprised it wasn't a Rick Roll.

Too many good deserving videos to waste a week on silliness.

It occurs to me that this graphics type would make an interesting 2D take on KSP for tablets and phones.

Edited April 2, 2015 by Alshain

A Kerbal or a Kerbale?

It would be the french word fo a she-Kerbal.
right here, right now! right here, right now!
Purely simple and simply pure. I liked it.

So I guess we don't get weekly post any more. Dev Notes late on Tuesday and that's it. It's now Friday. Ah I'm so bored. I need new and fresh content to read and watch now I'm looking after the kids full time.
